name: Flourish (GreenClovers)
description:
A game made for #GMTKjam 2020, the theme is "Out of Control". You play as Yolanda, a witch who loves gardening, and her magic helps her with this! Or... Hinders her. As you walk, you plant seeds, and as you pick flowers, your magic causes all the nearby flowers to grow faster! Add to this how some flowers don't get along with each-other, and you've got a florist who has more flowers then she can deal with! Pick flowers and deliver them to those who need them. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space or Z to pick a plant or deliver to a window

Press Shift or X to destroy a plant
